thread.title: Jets to release Brandon Marshall
thread.title_full: Jets to release Brandon Marshall | New York Post

author: Post Sports Desk
title: Jets to release Brandon Marshall
text:
The Jets are parting ways with Brandon Marshall.
The Pro-Bowl wide receiver appeared to be on the decline in 2016, finishing the season with 788 yards and three touchdowns in 15 games. The Jets’ emphasis on rebuilding in the offseason, having already released veterans Nick Mangold and Darrelle Revis in the past week, makes Marshall the latest casualty.
Marshall’s release frees up $7.5 million in cap space for the Jets.
